terms.title: Terms Agreement
terms.agreeAllDesc: I agree to all Terms of Service and Privacy Policy.
terms.termsContent:
Article 1 (Purpose)
These terms and conditions aim to define the terms of use, procedures, rights, obligations, responsibilities, and other necessary matters between MarZlog (hereinafter "Service") and its users.

Article 2 (Definitions)
① "Service" refers to all services related to photo management and AI analysis provided by MarZlog.
② "User" refers to members and non-members who use the Service in accordance with these terms.
③ "Member" refers to a person who has signed up for the Service and entered into a usage agreement.

Article 3 (Effect and Amendment of Terms)
① These terms take effect by being posted on the Service screen or by other means of notification.
② The Service may amend these terms as necessary, and amended terms shall be announced through notices.

Article 4 (Provision of Services)
① The Service performs the following tasks:
  1. Photo upload and storage service
  2. AI-based photo analysis and captioning
  3. Semantic search functionality
  4. Timeline organization
  5. Other tasks determined by the Service

Article 5 (Membership Registration)
① Users apply for membership by filling in the registration form and expressing their agreement to these terms.
② The Service registers applicants as members unless they fall under specific exclusion criteria.

Article 6 (Personal Information Protection)
The Service establishes and discloses a privacy policy in accordance with relevant laws to protect users' personal information.

Article 7 (Member Obligations)
① Members must comply with relevant laws, these terms, usage guides, and notices posted on the Service.
② Members may not transfer or gift their usage rights or contractual status to others.
terms.privacyContent:
1. Purpose of Processing Personal Information
MarZlog (hereinafter "Service") processes personal information for the following purposes:
- Membership registration and management
- Service provision and operation
- Photo storage and AI analysis

2. Personal Information Items Collected
- Required: Email, password, name
- Optional: Profile photo
- Automatically collected: Device info, access logs

3. Retention and Use Period
- Retained until membership withdrawal
- Retention periods per applicable laws:
  · Records on contracts or subscription withdrawal: 5 years
  · Records on payment and supply of goods: 5 years
  · Records on consumer complaints or disputes: 3 years

4. Provision to Third Parties
The Service does not, in principle, provide users' personal information to external parties.

5. Destruction Procedures and Methods
- Procedure: Immediately destroyed upon membership withdrawal
- Method: Electronic files are permanently deleted using irrecoverable methods

6. User Rights
- Request to view, correct, delete, or suspend processing of personal information
- Delete personal information through membership withdrawal

7. Personal Information Protection Officer
- Service Operations Team
- Contact: support@marzlog.com
